name: Project TAG
description:
Runners struggle for a free for all match in order to  come out on top. Only the best of the best are able to gain their freedom from the commercially acclaimed Tag Arena. Can you clear your Debt through your tactics & wits or are you doomed to endlessly fight in the matches.

Project TAG is an elimination tag game where it has a limited amount of time to tag another player or they're out. Players can use items as well as objects around the arena  to their advantage.

Note:

This game was made as a University Project

Created By:

Akarsh Kumar
